meanings.sent1: The nonadhesive tape easily peeled off the paper.
meanings.sent2: The nonadhesive label fell off the bottle.
meanings.sent3: The nonadhesive glue made the craft project a sticky situation.
meanings.sent4: Her nonadhesive personality allowed her to easily adapt to new situations.
meanings.sent5: The nonadhesive surface repelled any attempts to stick to it.

meanings.definition: Not having the ability to stick or adhere.
meanings.sent1: The nonadhesive bandage wouldn't stay on the wound.
meanings.sent2: The nonadhesive sticker kept falling off the wall.
meanings.sent3: The nonadhesive magnet couldn't hold up the picture.
meanings.sent4: His nonadhesive hands struggled to grasp the slippery object.
meanings.sent5: The nonadhesive material refused to bond with anything.

meanings.definition: Not causing things to stick or adhere.
meanings.sent1: The nonadhesive spray prevented the papers from sticking together.
meanings.sent2: The nonadhesive detergent easily washed off the dishes.
meanings.sent3: The nonadhesive lotion kept the skin smooth without any sticky residue.
meanings.sent4: The nonadhesive substance made cleaning up spills a breeze.
meanings.sent5: The nonadhesive coating on the pan made cooking and cleaning effortless.
